divs: sighting details1st event: in 1966 my dad and i were in our backyard early to mid afternoon. 3-6 pm about 1\2 to 1 mile up an object best described as a paper towel tube with portal holes down the side went sailing by from south to north direction. made no sound and we watched it from horizon to horizon as it headed toward canada over lake erie. what was odd was that as soon as that one reached the horizon to vanish from site, another one appeared following the same path. in all 4 tube like objects passed in moments, in a straight line. seemed we were watching a tour of the land. 2nd event: in 1990 i was coming home at about 12:30 at nite, thru what is called the fairveiw gravel pit. when i reached the stop sign to turn. there was an object sitting above the telephone pole in front of me. about 20 feet away and 20 feet off ground. i thought maybe a helicopter so i rolled the window down and no sound. so i stopped to look up at it. it then idled over me at 45 degree. the lights were on each side at the tip of what i'll call wings. and one light in front nose of object. the bottom had a 6 foot bubble that pulsated,but not see thru.as it idle over us,(girlfriend was with me), we watched in amazement. object was approx. 30 feet long and wide.and the backside looked just like the front so as looking at it, you didn't know if it was coming or going. it idled to the railroad tracks 50 feet away,and then idled down them 100 feet or more. we watched from the tracks and then continued on talking about it as we drove on. i turned around and went back looking for it again, but could not locate it. whether it took off, landed, or whatever, i do not know. these are both actual and factual sightings. what or who drove the objects i do not know, wish i did. lol anyway, i contacted you that maybe these were reported by others in past, and may add more insite to those events for your info. i am adding a fast sketch of these objects. so contact me at given email and i would gladly answer any questions. wayne
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fairview
There were no other sightings in Fairview on or around May 31st 1966
This sighting has never been favorited.
